payload.description: A testing extension for cspray/database-testing to setup a database for testing with PHPUnit

release.body:
## What's Changed
* Fix use statements in examples by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/database-testing-phpunit/pull/1

## New Contributors
* @cspray made their first contribution in https://github.com/cspray/database-testing-phpunit/pull/1

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cspray/database-testing-phpunit/commits/0.1.0

## What's Changed
* Make library framework-agnostic by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/database-testing/pull/19
* Prepare for 0.5 release, adjust ConnectionAdapter::selectAll to retur… by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/database-testing/pull/20
* Bug/fix connection adapter test case by @cspray in https://github.com/cspray/database-testing/pull/21


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/cspray/database-testing/compare/0.4.0...0.5.0
